lyrics:
16 contributorswhen the sun goes down lyricsverse 1
been a long day
waitin for the night to come
i check my iphone
let me see whats goin on goin on goin on
help me dj dj dj
play my favorite song
make the speakers shake speakers shake
now everybody wants to sing along sing along

prechorus
when the night is here
the only thing on my mind is havin a good time
when the moon appears
you can always hear us say

chorus
the party doesnt start til the sun goes down
thats when everything starts movin
everybody up when the sun goes down
ah ah ah
the music isnt on til its way too loud
thats when everyone starts dancin
everybody shout when the sun goes down

postchorus
when the sun goes down
when the sun goes down
when the sun goes down
oh oh oh yeah
you might also likeverse 2
pushing my hands up
im feeling good now
on the dance floor
we can turn it inside out inside out

prechorus
when the night is here
the only thing on my mind
is havin a good time with my friends thats real
you can always hear us say

chorus
the party doesnt start til the sun goes down
thats when everything starts movin
everybody up when the sun goes down
ah ah ah
the music isnt on til its way too loud
thats when everyone starts dancin
everybody shout when the sun goes down

when the sun goes down
when the sun goes down
when the sun goes down
oh oh oh yeah

when the moon appears
you can always here us say

you can always here us say
oh oh oh yeah
